items.text: full outside off, poked to extra cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: short ball rising up at a middle stump line. Backs away and has a hoick at this. Gets in woeful shape and is beaten
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: this flies into the off side off this pad as he looks to flick. Takes a couple of steps down, draws a throw which hits the stumps and deflects towards fine leg. They take the run. Third umpire called for - confirms he was in
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: slower ball at a length on leg stump, allows it to come on craftily tickles it past short fine
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.text: full ball down leg side, can't get bat onto it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 wide

items.text: offcutter bowled full on leg stump. Blocked off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: blazed away! Mashrafe goes short and it's a bad result waiting to happen. It's an offcutter to boot. Gayle has even more time than he needs. Sits right back in the crease and slaps it flat over the extra cover boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, SIX runs

items.text: length ball angled in at off stump, pushed down the pitch off the inside half
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: full and down leg side. Can't get the sweep away
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 wide

items.text: length outside off, doesn't get to the pitch as he tries to drive. Thick inside edge to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: quicker one is not picked and he just manages to get bat down in time. Length ball comes in rapidly as he gets on the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: short ball sliding into the corridor. Can't get the punch through the infield
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: length on off stump, punched to long-off off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: taken. Mashrafe persists and he gets his man. Lewis has been bottled up by Bangladesh's captain and it's him who gets the breakthrough eventually. Offcutter climbs in the corridor. It's at a good length but he's stabbing at it off the back foot. Flies high to the keeper's left and he takes it easily
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, OUT

dismissal.text: E Lewis c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mashrafe Mortaza 13 (33b 1x4 0x6) SR: 39.39

items.text: length and in at the stumps. Tapped into the midwicket region from the crease
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, hangs the bat outside off and is beaten
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, dropped into the off side with soft hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: inside edge as this hoops in late and skids inwards off the surface. He's not even in position to block as this pings way
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: slower ball on the pads and he pays. Bad end to the over. Gayle merely nudges this fine with the angle
items.postText: MJ Ahshan: "Mortaza 3-0 Lewis, Mortaza has dismissed Lewis in all 3 matches! Well done chap "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.text: length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, pushed down the pitch off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven towards long-on, but it's stopped with a dive by the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, shuffles across and flicks to short fine's right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run
